issue.title: [Go] wire all currently implemented array types in array.MakeFromData
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2964](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2964). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
it should be possible to use the `array.MakeFromData` to create values of all implemented array types. 

right now, only `arrow.BOOL`, `arrow.INT32`, `arrow.UINT64`, `arrow.INT64` and `arrow.FLOAT64` are wired in.
